projects.name: Messaging app
projects.description: Developed a messaging platform with the MEAN stack. Implemented real-time messaging, user authentication, and a responsive UI. Created RESTful APIs with Express.js and Node.js, and used MongoDB for data storage. Utilized AngularJS for dynamic, single-page applications.

projects.name: BingeIt
projects.description: Developed using React, BingeIt is an intelligent recommendation system for movies, books, and TV shows. Leveraging large language models (LLMs) and API integrations, the application analyzes user preferences to provide personalized recommendations.

projects.name: Personnel Manager
projects.description: Designed and developed a robust Personnel Management System using C# in conjunction with Microsoft SQL Server. Created a comprehensive CRUD application for efficient tracking and management of personnel records.

projects.name: Bone Age Prediction Model
projects.description: Wrote a paper comparing 3 different models for estimation of Bone age in months taken from Xray of infants. Paper submitted to IEEE, under review.
